title: Sampler, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, double running, herringbone,  stem, back,  eyelet,  cross, knot and  satin stitches with detached looping on plain weave foundation
description: Bands of multicolor pattern. Peacock and deer at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 17th century.
late 17th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, double running, herringbone,  stem, back,  eyelet,  cross, knot and  satin stitches with detached looping on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-83.
